title: The Reach (Animated)
overview: NZ Animated version of the Stephen King Story - Stella Flanders has never left Koati Island in her 95 years.  Afflicted by illness and a brutal winter, she starts to see the ghosts of her dead loved ones, including her late husband Bill. When the reach between the island and the mainland freezes over, she finds herself lured on to make the crossing once before she passes away.
